name: Wildest of the Wild
description:
Being a deputy sheriff, you are finding yourself in a State where the real lawlessness and depravity is happening. Just try to survive and seize the power, destroying bandits on your way ...Special Features
  • Self-explanatory gameplay and complete freedom of action
  • Interesting and unusual design
  • The vast territory of the State
  • The variety of upgrades and specialties
  • Several different factions and various enemies
  • Elements of survival and tactics
